title: Super May Saves the Day
backCoverBlurb: May wants to be a superhero! He wants to fly and help people. His favorite color is red. Join Super May and his amazing adventures!
characterDescription: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. He often looks surprised or excited. He is wearing a bright red cape over his striped shirt.

pages.text: May put on his bright red cape. Now I am Super May! he said.
pages.imagePrompt: May with curly blonde hair wearing a red cape and looking determined.

pages.text: Super May wants to help everyone in the neighborhood.
pages.imagePrompt: May standing tall on a garden path, cape fluttering.

pages.text: He saw a kitty stuck in a tall, green tree.
pages.imagePrompt: A small kitten meowing from a branch high up.

pages.text: Don't worry, kitty! Super May is here to help!
pages.imagePrompt: May looking up at the tree with a confident smile.

pages.text: He used his super strength to reach for the branch.
pages.imagePrompt: May stretching his arms up towards the kitten.

pages.text: The kitty jumped into May's soft, safe arms. Meow!
pages.imagePrompt: May holding the kitten and looking very glad.

pages.text: Then he saw Grandpa carrying heavy grocery bags.
pages.imagePrompt: An old man carrying two big bags of food.

pages.text: Super May zoomed over to help Grandpa carry them.
pages.imagePrompt: May 'flying' next to Grandpa and helping with a bag.

pages.text: You are a real hero, May! said Grandpa with a smile.
pages.imagePrompt: Grandpa patting May's shoulder, both are happy.

pages.text: Helping people made Super May feel super happy.
pages.imagePrompt: May with a big, joyful expression and blue eyes.

pages.text: Superheroes need rest too. It was time for a snack.
pages.imagePrompt: May sitting at a table with a glass of milk and a cookie.

pages.text: Even heroes sleep well after a big day of adventures.
pages.imagePrompt: May sleeping with his red cape tucked under his head.
